data.text: @CynthiaMcFadden @TODAYshow Maybe you could let Jenny know about us? We are a nat'l nonprofit helping as many grieving children as we can w/ no-cost summer camp where kids get to experience joy & learn how to navigate their grief. https://t.co/Rg0FqktSZ3 (we're based in CT) 💙
@CynthiaMcFadden @TODAYshow @CynthiaMcFadden how can I help? I live in Dallas area.
@CynthiaMcFadden @TODAYshow Would watch the show in a heartbeat if I wasn’t in RI getting my car serviced.  Horrible to think that 200,000 kids have been so impacted.

@CynthiaMcFadden @TODAYshow Such a powerful powerful story.  This family is amazing !! I’m shocked that there are over 200000 young people affected .  What can we do to help? Is there a way for the public to give financial support to this vulnerable group??
@CynthiaMcFadden @TODAYshow This was a great story about a situation that needs to be addressed.  Thanks for bringing it to light.
@CynthiaMcFadden @TODAYshow Could you please post a link to this family’s GoFundMe? These kids are so lovely. Such a heartbreaking story.
@CynthiaMcFadden @TODAYshow I wish you would look the people in the eye when you interview! You look up down it’s insincere looking
